issue.title: [C++][Compute] GroupBy: support more than 2^32 groups
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-12727](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-12727). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Support:
a) 64-bit hash, 
b) 64-bit group id and 
c) 64-bit hash table key offsets 
in hash group by.
